name: Quebec Winter Carnival
desc: One of the world's largest winter festivals featuring parades, ice sculptures and outdoor activities.

name: Quebec Summer Festival (FEQ)
desc: Major international music festival attracting top global artists.

name: New France Festival
desc: Historical celebration recreating 17th‑ and 18th‑century New France.
address: Jardins de l’Hôtel‑de‑Ville / Place de l’Hôtel‑de‑Ville, Old Quebec

name: Wendake International Pow Wow
desc: Cultural celebration of Indigenous traditions including dance, music, and ceremonies.
address: 10 Place de la Rencontre, Wendake, QC G0A 4V0

name: Envol et Macadam
desc: Alternative and underground music festival featuring local and international artists.

name: Loto‑Québec Fireworks Festival (Les Grands Feux)
desc: A series of spectacular fireworks shows over the St. Lawrence River.

name: KWE! Meet with Indigenous Peoples
desc: Public event highlighting Indigenous cultures, traditions and artistic expressions.

name: Quebec Opera Festival
desc: High‑quality opera performances in historic and modern venues.

name: Quebec City Film Festival (FCVQ)
desc: Film screenings, premieres and creative cinema experiences.

name: Kaléidoscopes
desc: Winter lights and multimedia installations in Old Quebec.

name: Pentathlon des Neiges
desc: Large winter sports competition featuring multiple disciplines.
address: Plains of Abraham, Québec City, QC
